item.description:
Let's meet for dinner before the Senna movie.

Let's meet ouside of the Rock Bottom restaurant, and we can decide where we want to have dinner based on our craving then.

We can have dinner at the Rock Bottom itself, or there is the Tantric Indian restaurant next door, or a food court next to the Indian which has a Mexican grill among others.  On the other side of the street, there are Thai and Chinese cuisine choices available.

 

The Boston Common Garage is a possible convenient affordable location to park.  After 4pm they charge $11.  Most GPS's list it.  Just search for the Boston Common Garage.  If not, you can find the directions here - http://www.massconvention.com/bcg_dir.html
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet outside of the restaurant. If it rains, there is a food court two doors down.
item.name: Dinner before the Senna Movie
